title: ONGC sells Nov-loading Sokol crude at higher premiums - sources
text:
ONGC sells Nov-loading Sokol crude at higher premiums - sources

Commodities 21 minutes ago (Sep 26, 2019 09:10)

© Reuters. ONGC sells Nov-loading Sokol crude at higher premiums - sources SINGAPORE, Sept 26 (Reuters) - * Indian oil explorer ONGC Videsh Ltd ONVI.NS has sold a cargo of Russian Sokol crude at a higher premium of about $7.1 a barrel to Dubai quotes via a tender, two trade sources told Reuters on Thursday * Details of the buyer were not immediately known * ONGC offered the cargo to load over Nov. 24-30 * Prior to this, ONGC sold its third Oct-loading Sokol crude cargo at a premium of about $5.75 a barrel to Dubai quotes via a tender

ONGC sells Nov-loading Sokol crude at higher premiums - sources
description: ONGC sells Nov-loading Sokol crude at higher premiums - sources
